string.text:
A journal with some missing pages, one passage reads:
"People go to me
and so do boats.
The boats bring the people,
and the people bring the boats."

A journal page, the passage reads:
"What always runs
but never walks,
often murmurs,
never talks,
has a bed but never sleeps,
has a mouth but never eats?"

A journal page, the passage reads:
"I am always hungry,
I must always be fed,
The finger I touch,
Will soon turn red"
A journal page, the passage reads:\n"Damned if you do,\ndamned if you don't"

A journal page, the passage reads:
"I drift forever with the current
down these long canals they've made
Tame, yet wild, I run elusive
Multitasking to your aid.
Before I came, the world was darker
Colder, sometimes, rougher, true
But though I might make living easy,
I'm good at killing people too."

A journal page, the passage reads:
"Final resting place
for men who sought fame,
whom's blood was drained
by feelers red stained."

A journal page, the passage reads:
"Often the home
of those who ask riddles
in exchange for passage."
A journal page, the passage reads:\n"Lifts you up,\n when you are down."
A journal page, the passage reads:\n"Congratulations, Stalker."
